body:
Comment 2: 
Ideally it would link to a page with the direct download links
(https://code.google.com/p/go/downloads/list) plus the bare minimum instructions to get
you going (how to set a GOPATH?).

A common technique is to also detect the user's OS from the browser and go to a page
that only has instructions for that OS. (Of course, you also need a "installing on a
different OS?" link.)
